info.name: Whatfinger.com - Neon Black Style (Dark Theme)
info.description:
Black background theme with bold neon colored fonts.
Easy read font size changes as well as margin and design changes to better fill the screen with more information.
All banner ads/advertising removal included for faster page loading.
Social Media annoyances removed as well.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated! - Removed top center graphic. V2.0
Made center main news column feed first and 2/3 of width now. 
Changed fonts to Open Sans.
Completely new color scheme
